short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for full screen/tab screenshots that are more accurate. Built using a modified version of Blipshot extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: this extension does not work as a standalone and needs to be used on a website with the WP Better Support WordPress plugin in order to function.

If you're using the WP Better Support plugin and you want better and more accurate screenshots then this is the extension you should be using.

Instead of using the default method of getting a screenshot (a Javascript capture that might not be accurate) this gives access to a Chrome browser function that allows for the screenshot to happen using the browser instead. The resulting screenshot is more accurate, sharper and a better guideline for anyone using the WPBS plugin.
